summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.0°C), outside temperature (down 2.9°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 19 miles), light levels (up 7502 lux), and cloud levels (up 135 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and moderately breezy. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather patterns to stay the same.
